radiographic_examinations.findings: Lobulated mass in the left lower lobe of the lung.
Lobulated opacity with a large feeding artery and large draining veins.
Large PAVF in the left ninth segment and a small PAVF near the main lesion.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Shunt ratio decreased from 32.7% to 9.8% after coil embolization.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Occlusion of arteriovenous shunting and preservation of normal peripheral pulmonary artery branches.
